title: Could anyone help me please???
content:
Hey everybody I'm working on a project and I need some help to Id these font..

Thanks in avance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2010-03-29 at 3.10.52 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016020038/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202010-03-29%20at%203.10.52%20AM.png) | 45.57 KB |
author: Pedro Henrique Gomes

comments.content: I think this is Canada Type's [Press Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016020038/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/press-gothic/), which is a revival of Aldo Novarese's "Metropol".
